SELECT A.*, M1.NICKNAME AS "ALARM_SENDER_NICKNAME", M1.PROFILE_PIC AS "ALARM_SENDER_PROFILE_PIC", M2.NICKNAME AS "ALARM_RECEIVER_NICKNAME", M2.PROFILE_PIC AS "ALARM_RECEIVER_PROFILE_PIC", BF.FILE_PATH AS "BOARD_FILE_PATH", BF.FILE_CHANGE_NAME AS "BOARD_FILE_CHANGE_NAME" FROM ALARM A LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M1 ON(A.ALARM_SENDER = M1.USERID) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(A.ALARM_RECEIVER = M2.USERID) LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD_FILE BF ON(A.BOARD_NO = BF.BOARD_NUMBER AND BF.FILE_THUMBNAIL='1') WHERE ALARM_RECEIVER = #{userId} ORDER BY ALARM_NO DESC
